name: Apps
body:
### Apps for the ManyStories project

This is the repository for the Apps that are using the APIs and data from [manystoriesoneheart.gr](http://manystoriesoneheart.gr).

You can create an App too and get it listed here.

#### Available APIs

1. RESTful API: [manystoriesoneheart.gr/api](http://manystoriesoneheart.gr/api)

Documentation about this API can be found here: [manystories.readthedocs.org/en/latest/restapi/](http://manystories.readthedocs.org/en/latest/restapi/)

2. SPARQL Endpoint: [manystoriesoneheart.gr/sparql](http://manystoriesoneheart.gr/sparql)

Documentation about this API can be found here: [manystories.readthedocs.org/en/latest/sparql/](http://manystories.readthedocs.org/en/latest/sparql/)

#### License of the Data

All the data are available under [Creative Commons Attribution 4.0](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/) but this can change. In any case the license will be an Open license and it will be compatible with the [CKAN](http://ckan.org/) hubs taken from [licenses.opendefinition.org](http://licenses.opendefinition.org/licenses/groups/ckan.json).

The license can be found on the API for each item.

#### License of the App

You must have an **open source license** for your App. If you are not sure about the license take some help here: [choosealicense.com](http://choosealicense.com/). The license must be included on your App folder.

#### How to submit an App

You can make a **pull request** on this repository. Of course you need to fork it first.

#### Are there any html markup that need to contain in a web App

You are free to create your App as you prefer. There are no any styling guidelines etc. Though it would be fair to contain the information below on the top, sidebar or bottom of your App which are:

- The source code of the App (pointing on this repo)
- A valid title
- The license of the App
- The [logo](http://manystoriesoneheart.gr/sites/all/themes/manystories/logo.png) of the website linked to the [main website](http://manystoriesoneheart.gr)
